entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:01 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
